response: "I feel like I'm drowning in the expectations of society. I can't keep up anymore."
"Why does everyone expect me to be perfect? I'm only human."
"I'm starting to feel like I'm not good enough for anyone, no matter how hard I try."
"It's like the more I try to be perfect, the more I feel like a failure."
"I'm so tired of pretending like everything's okay when it's not. I just want to be accepted for who I am."
"It's like society wants me to be a certain way, but I don't even know who I am anymore."
"I'm scared that if I don't meet society's expectations, I'll be rejected and alone."
"Why is it so hard to be happy with myself when everyone else seems to have it all together?"
"I wish I could just ignore all the pressure and focus on what makes me happy, but it's easier said than done."
"I'm starting to resent myself for not being perfect. It's like I'm my own worst enemy."
